thread.title: Europe Flights on United from $850+ R/T
thread.title_full: Europe Flights on United from $850+ R/T

title: Europe Flights on United from $850+ R/T
text:
Home > Flight Deals > Europe Flights on United from $850+ R/T Europe Flights on United from $850+ R/T by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff - June 30, 2015 at 2:53 PM Tweet 
Ditch the crowds and peak season's high rates by doing Europe during the off-season. Fall flights to Berlin, Dublin, London, Zurich, and more than a couple dozen other European routes are on sale with United. 
Round-trip, taxes-and-fees-inclusive prices start at $850; and must be booked by July 8. Travel is valid August 23 - October 31; but minimum-night-stay restrictions of at least 10 days won't work for those seeking a short trip. Find Related Stories: Read comments or add your own insight!
